person_say: I'm having problems working with my team and it's delaying our progress. Is there a way to improve our collaboration skills?
animal_say: Collaboration challenges can be tough! What specifically is causing the delays within your team?

person_say: I'm facing challenges in communication and coordination among team members. Everyone seems to have different priorities, and it's making it hard for us to align our efforts.
animal_say: I see! Team coordination is essential. There's a busy bee named Bizy who can help you with time management and collaboration. Interested in meeting her?

person_say: Yes, I would love to meet Bizy and learn more about time management and collaboration!
animal_say: Great! Bizy will buzz in and help you enhance your teamwork skills. Let's go meet her!
